channel.title: The Only One Helping On Fourms Atm
channel.description:
Lol the only person on fourms thats helping atm Mental Piracy
If i could rep you i would of bro
Dont get me wrong people im no saying yes help me.. its just that when people need help you hardly get it on these fourms :/
What you think repping me down breaks my heart? LOL why do i care about rep? im just here to get some help nd i aint receiving none

item.title: The Only One Helping On Fourms Atm
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

There is no such thing as a high ranked member on this site, every member has the same amount of rights as our most seniors do.
Nobody is inferior to anybody else on this website, I would just like to make that clear to everybody now.

I’m going to lock this as all it has attracted is spam and flame.

Read full topic

Ok Bro

Not really necessary lol. Others help, just most have given up hope on helping new people because 95% of the new people dont even know the basics of java. The constant leeching and begging in posts gets old, but im definitely not the only one trying to help.

In topic January 08, 2011, 06:30:47 PM shrogg (+19/-200) krackkid (+10/-10) 1 lol, i like it In topic January 02, 2011, 03:53:36 PM OnlyOneRule (+39/-10) krackkid (+10/-10) 2 LOLd - mitb In topic January 02, 2011, 09:43:01 AM Rix_ (+76/-200) krackkid (+10/-10) 13 L0L0LL0L In topic December 27, 2010, 03:42:07 PM Classic_ (+9/-199) krackkid (+10/-10) 13 <3 In topic December 27, 2010, 04:02:36 AM h1 sk1ller (+8/-200) krackkid (+10/-10) -1 nubby :) In topic December 27, 2010, 01:11:00 AM Immortal Technique (+10/-51) krackkid (+10/-10) 1 hi - mscp In topic December 23, 2010, 05:32:22 PM

item.title: The Only One Helping On Fourms Atm
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:8, topic:393280”][quote author=JuniorCautionz link=topic=490449.msg3586243#msg3586243 date=1304203317]

Yeah because the guy who just joined basically and has 9 rep knows a hole lot about the shit that goes on here. Just cause were not there to guide you threw things and teaching you 24-7 cause your to lazy to pick up a damn java book for 5$ and learn it for real. So don’t EVER say that no one on this site is helping, because the high ranking members in this community who aren’t active in the help sections 24-7 are doing REAL work.

LOL How Did I Just Join??
AND I NEVER FUCKING SAID THERES NO ONE HELPING I JUST SAID HES THE ONLY ONE HELPING ATM Read ffs
[/quote]
Thanks for disrespecting the whole community with this topic because you got all pissy that a section (Client help) has almost died all the way. Now that your claiming that you didn’t just join you should know that this is common knowable. Oh and probably want to start making apologies before all the other high ranking members on the community see this and push you into our circle of people who we don’t like. Have a nice day.[/quote]
This.
And if you get pushed in, there is no getting out, and i will forever be your leader.

Also, this topic has no point… just lock it…

Read full topic

item.title: The Only One Helping On Fourms Atm
item.dc:creator: @JuniorCautionz JuniorCautionz
item.description:
@JuniorCautionz wrote:

Yeah Good Point But

See Im Making my Webclient…
Im Not Begging Anyone To Make It For Me
All im Doing Is Giving It Ago With It Myself Nd If I Had A Problem I Wud Post On Fourms…
So In The Future If I Did Ever Have A Problem Like That I Wouldn’t Have To Post On Fourms…

Read full topic
item.source: The Only One Helping On Fourms Atm

item.title: The Only One Helping On Fourms Atm
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“JuniorCautionz, post:3, topic:393280”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=490449.msg3586218#msg3586218 date=1304201740]

Lol the only person on fourms thats helping atm Mental Piracy

If i could rep you i would of bro

Dont get me wrong people im no saying yes help me… its just that when people need help you hardly get it on these fourms

Maybe he’s the only one who helps you, but he is certainly not the only one who helps.
[/quote]

Yeah he might not be the only one im not gonna argue over that… but why cant we get help when we need it?[/quote]

Because we are not here to cater to your every beck and call. We help when we can. If we don’t know how to do something, we won’t post telling you such. If we know how to solve your problem, we will instruct you on how to solve it yourself. For it has been stated many times before, this is not a spoonfeeding community. If you want that, go to Rune Server. Here, we want to help people learn the Java programming language, through RuneScape Private Server Development. If you are not willing to make an effort, neither are we.

Read full topic
